Dialogue.Value: Welcome to the Battle Board!,I’m YanFan， the,Board Administrator.
Everyone! Help us fill this,board with NetBattle info!
We can’t afford to lose to,net crime or viruses!
Say， are you guys using,the Regular System?
To set a regular chip，,press SELECT in the,folder editing screen.
My regular chip is RayGun!,What’s yours?
Yo〜!,I’m Mars， and this is my,first post!
Regular chips， huh〜?,If you take damage often，,how about a Recov20?
If you’re in trouble， just,use Recov20 and run!,It works great!
Heyooo!,RenkoSis here!
There are more ways to,use a regular chip than just,sending a specific chip
for your Navi to use.,For example， I highly,recommend Power+10.
That extra 10 power can,really come in handy!
It’s an ＊ code， so you can,easily ADD or dig into your,folder faster!
When times are tough， pick,Power+10! It’s flawless!
Nice to meet you all.,I’m Mesh. RenkoSis seems,like an amazing Netbattler!
I’ve never heard of that,strategy before!
As for my regular chip， I was,using a Barrier that I found，,but....
Barrier B didn’t work well with,my A-coded folder.
I’ll try using Power+10 from,now on!,Thanks， RenkoSis!
My name is ChoChon.,Nice to meet you.
This is slightly off-topic， but,I have an odd story to tell.
I picked three different,RayGun chips together，,and they started glowing!
Then， those three chips,turned into one super,powerful chip!
But they turned back to,normal after the fight!,How strange....
I kept picking three RayGuns,together， but I couldn’t get it,to work again.
Maybe it has something,to do with one of the three,being RayGun C?
If you know anything about,this， please let me know!
Heyooo!,RenkoSis here!
ChoChon， that must be a,”Program Advance”!,(P.A. for short!)
Selecting specific kinds of,chips in a certain order will,cause a P.A.
For example， you’ll get a P.A.,by picking RayGuns A， B， and,C in that order.
You can even get a P.A. by,picking Knife， Sword， and,Lance together.
Thank you， RenkoSis!
I remember choosing the,chips in alphabetical order,the last time it worked!
I see how aiming for Program,Advances can be quite strong!
I just tried the Knife， Sword，,Lance Program Advance!
Like you said， it turned into,a powerful chip!,That’s pretty handy!
However， I had trouble,attacking until the Custom,Gauge filled up again.
The two Sword chips I put,in were stuck at the bottom,of my folder! (lol)
Heyooo!,RenkoSis here!
You tested it right away,YanFan? You must be,collecting chips often!
Like YanFan said， P.A.s are,powerful， but you have to be,kinda lucky.
NetOps need to think on,their feet when deciding,when to go for a P.A.
Sometimes you’re better off,just using the chips normally.
Maybe it’s better to consider,P.A.s as a last resort?
Thanks， RenkoSis!,Great advice as always!
Oh yeah， that’s right!,The AddOn Manager is,finally out!
Now I can easily upgrade,my Navi， even though I’m,bad at programming!
I just bought some AddOns,to power up the Buster!
Nice to meet you!,I’m Parasol!
I’ve been waiting for the,AddOn Manager to come,out too!
I bought two Custom+,AddOns to help me combo,with my chips!
But the program buzzed at,me when I tried to install the,second one....
What should I do?
Parasol， did you buy two,AddOns of the same color....?,(lol)
You can’t install two AddOns,that have the same color.
Thanks， Mars!,I reread the manual， and that,rule was in there too!!
I got so excited that I already,messed up! (lol)
Luckily， my cousin wanted a,Custom+， so I traded it to him,for a chip!
I’ll go look around for AddOns,with a different color! Thanks!
Are virus questions okay,here? I just can’t beat,that grasshopper virus!
I can’t hit it while it’s jumping,around， so I always run away.
The grasshopper virus，,huh....? That’s a tough one.
I try to slice it when it jumps,at me， but it sometimes jumps,at weird angles....
Heyooo!,RenkoSis here!
It can be tough to fight a,GunHopper if you’re not,used to it!
One reliable strategy is,to wait in the back row and,move up and down!
That way， it can’t shoot at you,without entering your area.
Its shots won’t spread much，,so it’s easy to dodge them,when it jumps near you!
Wow!,Thanks a bunch， RenkoSis!
Your advice has made me,a lot more consistent in my,battles!
By the way， are you thinking,of entering the N1 League?
Heyooo!,RenkoSis here!
You’re a quick learner，,ChoChon!
I already qualified， so I’ll be,competing in the main event!
Way to go， RenkoSis!,Congrats on qualifying!
You’ve got the skills to win,the tournament!,I’ll be rooting for you!
The N1 League is over!,Those were some awesome,battles!
Even RenkoSis was no,match for such a high-level,tournament!
Heyooo!,RenkoSis here!
Well， I lost!,The other competitors really,were something else!
I was busy worrying about that,Navi named ”Salamandre”....
But I ended up losing to the,Navi that beat him!
Next time there’s a,tournament， I’ll win for sure!
For RenkoSis to lose....,Your opponent must have,been really strong!
I’m gonna practice hard so,I can battle RenkoSis in a,tournament someday!
Evening，Parasol here!
I was battling my cousin the,other day，and I put down a,Cube for cover.
I accidentially hit it with a,ColdAir and it launched off!
It hit him for 200 damage，and,even broke through his shield!
Isn’t that amazing?
Heyooo!,RenkoSis here!
Whoa Parasol，you’ve found a,hidden secret of Cube!
Yes，Cubes and even other,items can be pushed and used,as missiles!
They do a ton of damage，and,can break through defenses!
If you see a rock on the field，,give it a shot and see what,happens....
Thanks for the commentary，,RenkoSis!
That’s a two-chip combo that’s,both useful and easy-to-use!
Even if they can dodge it，the,Cube will block their moves!
I’m never taking ColdAir out of,my folder again!
I also had a NetBattle with a,friend recently.
He threw a Knife at me!
Is there a Knife-throwing chip?,Does anyone know?
Heyooo!,RenkoSis here!
Mesh，that Knife was actually a,Chip Command!
Knife is normally a short-range,slash，but hold down A and,follow it up with ↓ + →!
Wow，you just threw the Knife!,Try it out!
OMG!,I’m a Knife-thrower now!
It was tough getting used to it，,but once I nailed ↓ + →，it was,a piece of cake!
You’re my saviour，RenkoSis!
You can do it with SlvKnife too!
On that note，I was looking for,an easy-to-use chip to break,defenses.
I found my friend’s Tank Navi’s,chip，and in the description it,said it had a Chip Command!
If you press B 3 times before the,first shot，the attack changes!
I’m new here -- Hi，I’m Chiko.
If we’re talking about Navi chip,Chip Commands，I’ve got one!
I found a Thunder Navi’s chip，,you can command between the,freeze and them appearing.
LLR for a horizontal row of,thunder，and RRL for an X,shape!
If you’ve got that Navi’s chip，,give it a shot!
Hi Chiko，let me be the first to,greet you!
I think I have that chip!,I didn’t know it had Chip,Commands!
I love having options to adjust,area，so I can hit all enemies,at the same time!
It’s Parasol again!
I’ve got so many good AddOns，,but I just don’t have enough,Cores or Hertz!
What do I do，guys?
Hey Parasol，I too suffer from,a Core/Hertz deficiency (lol).
My friend said he got a,CorePlus as a reward from the,request board，though.
Why not try out being Parasol,the Handyman for a bit?
Requests! I never even thought,about that!
Traffic’s always bad，though!,I can never go anywhere!
What would I do if the client’s,in another prefecture?
Board Admin YanFan chiming,in.
The request board is designed,so that only requests in your,local area are shown.
If you take a request，it’ll be,from a client in your,neighborhood.
Thanks，YanFan!,I just checked and there was a,request from my own school!
I think I’ll be the most useful,person in my neighborhood!
Well，Parasol，you found one,solution to your Core and Hertz,problems.
I managed to make ends meet,with Minus AddOns.
I found a shop selling them,in the Lord Usa comp in Eien,Town.
Heyooo!,RenkoSis here!
That’s quite a risk to be using,Minus AddOns，Mesh!
Minus AddOns increase your,Cores and Hertz by adding,negative effects!
Sometimes you can use chips,to get around the negative,effects，though!
For me，I use ShlArmr with a,StunDmg Minus AddOn.
You won’t be stunned if you’ve,got ShlArmr’s Super Armor!
Minus AddOns!,I didn’t know they could be so,useful!
I got one from my friend，but I,was afraid to use it!
Using chips to cancel the,downside....,I’ll check it out!
Greetings， all!,Any pro virus hunters here able,to help a newbie out?
I’m starting off easy，looking for,a KedamaSP in Genso Area 1，,but it’s nowhere to be found!
I just need this bounty after,splurging on AddOns，can,anyone help me?
Welcome!,I’m no pro，but I might have an,idea of what’s going on....
Judging from your name....,Have you been running into a,lot of those pesky oni viruses?
You might have left one of those,fancy new AddOns installed!
I’ve done the same myself，,those “Peac“ AddOns are just,too useful for collectors!
Once “ElecPeac” is uninstalled，,just keep running around and,you’ll find one eventually.
I’ve heard the pros know ways,to sniff them out，but that’s way,out of my league. Peace! (lol)
That was it!,Thanks，Mars!
I knew something felt off，but I,think those oni are cute so I,didn’t realize anything!
